cc.setting

Interface ChineseCharacterTypeSetter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MergePieceSetter, SimpleAreaSetter, SimpleImageSetter, SimplePieceSetter, 字型參考設定工具, 物件活字基礎設定工具

    public interface ChineseCharacterTypeSetter
    活字設定工具。將部件結構（ChineseCharacter）轉換成活字結構（ ChineseCharacterMovableType）。
    Author:
    Ihc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      漢字組建活字 setTzu(ChineseCharacterMovableTypeTzu parent, ChineseCharacterTzu chineseCharacterTzu)
      產生並初使化合體活字
      漢字組建活字 setWen(ChineseCharacterMovableTypeTzu parent, ChineseCharacterWen chineseCharacterWen)
      產生並初使化獨體活字
